Gina has been sustaining her business activities through her past 2 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of beauty products to sell

loans.name: Julie

texts.en: Julie, 41 years old, is married and has two children, both in school. Julie works hard to provide for her family. For the past 2 years, she has run a general store in the Philippines. She also earns an income from pig fattening. Julie has requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell. Julie has previously borrowed and repaid four loans from NWTF. She aspires to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is 55 years old and married with nine children. With three children in school, she works very hard to provide for them.

Editha runs a general store in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to purchase an additional stock of items to sell like canned goods, fruits, beverages, etc..

She has been in this business for 20 years. 

In the future, Editha would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase an additional stock of items to sell like canned goods, fruits, beverages, etc.

loans.name: Melanie

texts.en:
Melanie works hard to support her family. She is married, and has a recycled materials business in the Philippines.

Melanie is borrowing PHP 1,800  through NWTF to buy a solar lamp.

She is getting the solar lamp because she wants to have backup light in case of an emergency.

Melanie is aware that by using the solar lamp she is saving money, she is helping the environment, and reducing health and hazard risks to her family.

loans.use: to buy a solar lamp.

loans.name: Angelita

texts.en:
Angelita is 48 years old and married with three children. All of her children are in school; Angelita works very hard to provide for them.

Angelita runs a general store in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell like canned goods, beverages, groceries, etc..

She has been in this business for two years, and sells a variety of items such as candies, junk foods, condiments, etc.. 

In the future, Angelita would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell like canned goods, beverages, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Ma. Evelyn

texts.en:
Ma. Evelyn works hard to support nine children. She is married, and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Ma. Evelyn requested a PHP 1,800 loan through NWTF to buy a solar lamp.

She is getting the solar lamp because she wants to have backup light in case of an emergency.

Ma. Evelyn is aware that by using the solar lamp, she is not only saving money, she is also helping the environment, and reducing health and hazard risks to her family.

loans.use: to buy a solar lamp.

loans.name: Roman

texts.en:
Roman is from Drogobych. He is married and has two young children. He has been offering transportation services for about three years. Roman transports all sorts of goods and merchandise. He has his loyal clientele. Recently, he has mostly been transporting vegetables from the Transcarpathian region.

Roman needs 5,000 Grivnyas to fix the vehicle that is his workhorse in business. As his business has already gained a good reputation and there is always demand for his services, Roman is hoping to fix up his vehicle as soon as possible, to be able to continue with his working schedule. One of Roman's big plans is to earn enough money to buy his own house, some day.

loans.use: to fix the vehicle that is his workhorse in business

loans.name: Seutaatia

texts.en:
Seutaatia is 40 years old and unmarried with 2 children. She has a small plantation where she grows taro and bananas that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for 1 year.

Seutaatia needs a loan to buy crops, fertilizer, a new wheelbarrow, a tiller, a rake, new gum boots and a spade. She has been a member of SPBD since 2014. Seutaatia will use the profits from her sales to pay for her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy crops, fertilizer, a new wheelbarrow, a tiller, a rake, new gum boots and a spade

loans.name: Aminata's Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe  YELEN est constitué de  4 femmes mariées ayant une moyenne d’âge de 42 ans et 5 enfants. Elles vivent  dans des  familles traditionnelles  élargies dans le quartier  HEREMAKONO NORD de la ville de Bougouni. 
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, d’amitié et de commerce. Pour renforcer leur capacité financière afin de mieux faire leur commerce, elles ont adhéré à l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso avec laquelle elles sont à leur 3ème prêt. Les 2 précédents prêts ont été correctement remboursés. Ce groupe de femmes fait le commerce  de pagnes à l’image de SETOU qui est la femme assise devant dans la photo. Elle compte acheter avec son  prêt, 13 pièces  de pagnes avec les grossistes  de Bougouni. Elle effectue ses ventes au marché  et à domicile, en détail au comptant et à crédit  à une clientèle mixte . 
Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 50.000FCFA qui sera  investi dans les activités et rembourser le prêt.
texts.en:
The YELEN group consists of four married women who average 42 years of age and five children each. They all live in extended traditional families in the district of northern HEREMAKONO, city of Bougouni. They know one another as neighbors and friends, and through their commercial activities. 

To bolster their capital and better operate their businesses, the group members decided to join the Soro Yiriwaso microfinance organization. This is their third group loan cycle, and both past loans were correctly repaid. 

SETOU sells pagnes; she is the member sitting in the front in the group photo. She plans to use her loan to buy 13 units of pagnes from Bougouni wholesalers. She retails her merchandise to a mixed clientele at the market and from her home, cash or credit.

Setou expects to earn an average monthly profit of 50,000FCFA, which she will use to repay her loan and to reinvest in her activity.

loans.use: to buy pagnes for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sugar, rice, wheat flour, maize flour, cooking fat, and detergents.

loans.name: Makhfirat

texts.ru:
Махфират женщина-предпринимтаель из северного района Спитамен. Ей 37 лет. Она начала свой бизнес в 2004 году собственным рабочим капиталом и уже 10 лет как продолжает его. Махфират в данный момент имеет торговую точку на центральном рынке района, где и занимается продажей мужской одежды. Она привозит только качественный товар и сама выбирает коллекцию одежд для продажи. У нее хороший опыт в продажах и подход к каждому клиенту. 
Махфират решила привезти новый товар для увеличения ассортимента сезонной одежды и привлечения большего количества клиентов. Однако ей не хватает немного средств, чтобы осуществить цель. Махфират в связи с этим просит кредит и надеется на вашу отзывчивость. 
Махфират в будущем не собирается останавливаться на достигнутом и планирует расширить свою торговую точку.
texts.en:
Makhfirat is a female entrepreneur from the Spitamen region in northern Tajikistan. She is 37 years old. She launched her business in 2004 with her own starting capital and has been  developing this business since, for over 10 years now. At present Makhfirat has a sales stand at the central market of her region, where she sells men’s clothing. She chooses only quality merchandise for sale and  puts together each season's collection herself. She has a lot of experience in sales and is able to provide individualized customer service.

Makhfirat has been able to stock up on new merchandise to increase the selection of seasonal clothing and attract more customers. However, she is somewhat short of the amount necessary. This is why Makhfirat is requesting a loan and hopes for your kindness.
In the future, Makhfirat  has no intention to relax her efforts: she plans to expand her sales stand.

loans.use: to buy a selection of seasonal men's clothing to develop her retail business.

loans.name: Epegenia

texts.en:
Epeginia, 44 years old, is married and has three children. She works hard to provide for her family. For the past 10 years, Epeginia has run a general store in the Philippines. She has successfully repaid her previous loan and now has requested another PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items such as canned goods, beverages, groceries, etc. to sell.

Epeginia has previously borrowed and repaid 8 loans from NWTF. She aspires to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional items such as canned goods, beverages, groceries, etc. to sell

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en: Lorna, 41 years old, is married and has four children, three of them in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. For the past 12 yeas, Lorna has operated a room rental business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase materials to use in her business. In the future, Lorna would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase materials to use in her business

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en: Teresita, 34 years old, is married and has three children, two of them in school. Teresita works very hard to provide for them. For the past 4 years, Teresita has run a general store in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items such as eggs, beverages, canned goods, etc. to sell. In the future, Teresita would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional items such as eggs, beverages, canned goods, etc. to sell

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en: Lorna is married and has a general store business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 1,800 loan through NWTF to buy a solar lamp because she wants to have backup light in case of emergency. Lorna is aware that by using the solar lamp, she is not only saving money, but also helping the environment and reducing health and hazard risks to her family.

loans.use: to purchase a solar lamp.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Joseph lives in Githunguri, Kenya with his family. He owns a farm and keeps dairy cows. Joseph is most proud of his and his family's generosity in the community. Please help him to get a biogas system. With a biogas system he plans to save money and time on collecting firewood and buying charcoal. By saving this time, he plans to put more energy into other projects on his farm to make his farm more profitable and provide a better life for his family.

loans.use: To pay for a biogas system to use clean energy for cooking for his family

loans.name: Ann

texts.en:
Ann learned about biogas from a neighbor who was already happily using biogas for cooking from Takamoto Biogas. When she learned that she could be using the waste from her dairy cows for clean cooking energy she decided she should get one too! 

Ann is a very talkative women so it is not surprising to know that in addition to her dairy farm, she is also a successful business women. She is most excited about the idea of biogas because once she doesn't have to spend time collecting and lighting firewood, she will have more time for her business of which she is very proud! Please help Ann to get a biogas system!

loans.use: to pay for a biogas system to have clean energy for cooking for her family

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for a biogas system providing clean cooking fuel for her family

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for a biogas system to have clean energy for cooking

loans.name: Malaea

texts.en: Malaea, 47 years old, is married and has 3 children. For the past 5 years, she has run a BBQ stall and a flea market selling veggies from her garden. Malaea needs a loan to buy a large BBQ grill set, 2 large tables, a tarpaulin, a new wheelbarrow, iron poles and fresh meat. She will use her profits to pay for her family's weekly expenses. Malaea joined SPBD in 2009 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy a large BBQ grill set, 2 large tables, a tarpaulin, a new wheelbarrow, iron poles and fresh meat

loans.name: Oksana

texts.en:
Oksana is a small entrepreneur from Drogobych. She sells second-hand clothing and footwear. Due to low pricing and the variety of available merchandise at her vending location, Oksana always has customers willing to buy goods from her. Oksana is 51. She is married and has two, grown children.

Oksana is hoping to get an additional 40,000 Grivnyas. She will use the loan to purchase used clothing and footwear wholesale, for later retail sale. One of her short-term plans is to expand her business and open a second little store, selling the same kind of merchandise.

loans.use: to purchase used clothing and footwear at wholesale, for sale to her customers at retail

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of food supplies and clothing.

loans.name: Julia Rossmery

texts.es:
Julia Rossmery tiene 22 años de edad, es soltera, vive en casa de sus padres en el distrito de Buenos Aires. La vida en el distrito es tranquila, sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería, como sustento principal, siembra y cosecha de banano,maíz, frejol caupí. Etc. Dicho distrito está ubicado en la provincia de Morropón, región de Piura, costa norte de Perú.

La actividad que realiza Julia Rossmery es la venta de abarrotes: pollos, arroz, azúcar, dulces, etc. La actividad la realiza desde hace más de 1 año en el distrito; el destino del crédito será para invertirlo en su negocio de abarrotes, pues desea realizar la compra de articulos de primera necesidad en mayores cantidades, para aumentar y diversificar y su stock de productos. La inversión le ayudará a obtener mejores ingresos. El mercado presenta buenas perspectivas debido a que el negocio es una de las actividades principales como ingreso económico. Julia Rossmery piensa trabajar invirtiendo en su negocio y obtener mejores ganancias que le permitan a un mediano o corto plazo aumentar sus ingresos e ir creciendo para ofrecer más productos que satisfacen a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Julia Rossmery is 22 years old. She is single, and she lives with her parents in the district of Buenos Aires. Life in the district is quiet. Its inhabitants work mostly in agriculture and farming. They cultivate and harvest bananas, corn, beans, black-eyed peas, etc. 
The district is located in the province of Morropon, region of Piura, north coast of Peru.

Julia Rossmery sells groceries: chickens, rice, sugar, candy, etc. She is been doing this for over a year. The loan will be used to invest it in her grocery store. She wants to buy big amounts of basic needs products to increase and diversify her stock.

This investment will help her to get a better income. The market seems to work well because this business is her main occupation to get an income.

Julia Rossmery wants to invest in her business to get better profits that will allow her to increase her income in a short period of time. She wants to keep growing so she can offer the products that will satisfy her clients.

loans.use: to buy more products to increase and diversify the stock.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en: Marilyn, 37 years old, is married and has three children, all in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. For the past 3 years, Marilyn has operated a sound system business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase an additional sound box to use in her business. In the future, Marilyn would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase an additional sound box for her business

loans.name: Mylene

texts.en: Mylene, 33 years old, is married and has two children. Mylene works very hard to provide for them. For the past 7 years, Mylene has run a general store in the Philippines, selling a variety of items such as canned goods, rice, junk foods, soft drinks, etc. She has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase items such as canned goods, beverages, groceries, etc. to sell. In the future, Mylene would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase items such as canned goods, beverages, groceries, etc. to sell

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en: Nenita, 59 years old, has six children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. For the past 25 years, Nenita has operated an auto-shop business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 4,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional materials to use in her business. In the future, Nenita would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials to use in her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a bull and livestock feed for the winter

loans.name: Nimfa

texts.en:
Nimfa is 55 years old, with five children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Nimfa has a bicycle transportation business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 5,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to purchase spare parts and other materials to use in her business.

Nimfa has been in this business for five years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts and other materials to use in her business.

loans.name: Winefreda

texts.en:
Winefreda is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Winefreda is 48 years old and all of her children are in school.

Winefreda has a food-vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Winefreda has been in this business for ten years. In the future, she would like to save enough money, so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Sefulu

texts.en:
Sefulu is a 48-year-old woman who is married with 6 children. She has a small taxi business to earn an income. She has been in this business for 3 years. 

Sefulu needs a loan to buy new tyres, wind shield wipers, new seat covers, get a new paint job and a taxi sign. She will use her profits to pay for her family's weekly expenses. Sefulu joined SPBD in 2011 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy new tyres, wind shield wipers, new seat covers, get a new paint job and a taxi sign.

loans.name: Israel Romario

texts.es:
Israel es un joven hombre de 22 años de edad, soltero sin hijos y su negocio es la confección de pantalones. 
Él es optimista, emprendedor, constante, independiente, responsable y trabajador. Su trabajo lo realiza en la zona ‘Gran poder’ un lugar caracterizado por el comercio popular e informal en todas las áreas y también por su famosa entrada folclórica; La festividad del señor Jesús del Gran Poder es tradicional y costumbrista de la ciudad, y que se celebra con una extraordinaria demostración folclórica en honor de la imagen (en lienzo) que se venera en el Templo de la Calle Antonio Gallardo. De clima frío y seco con una temperatura aproximada entre 8-21 grados centígrados durante todo el año, y a una altura de 3600 metros sobre el nivel del mar.
Israel es de tez morena, cabello negro corto, estatura mediana, su lengua materna es el aymara que sólo utiliza con sus familiares mayores, para el comercio y en la vida diaria habla español. Su vida la realiza en la casa de sus padres, un departamento de tres pisos que cuenta con agua potable y electricidad y donde instaló en una pequeña habitación un taller de costura. Su negocio es la confección de pantalones de vestir, pantalones cortos (shorts), bermudas, pantalones de entrenamiento, pantalones de trabajo (overalls), ropa interior (boxers), etcétera. Las ventas las realiza por mayor según la cantidad de pedidos que reciba.  Su sueño es tener un taller mucho más grande y con operarios. Y desea realizar la compra de tela por mayor para abastecer la demanda de fin de año. Esta es la primera secuencia de préstamos con la institución en seis años que viene realizando esta labor.
Es por esos motivos que Israel solicita un préstamo para la compra de material de confección para abastecer la demanda de pantalones debido a la época.
texts.en:
Israel, 22, is a single young man with no children.  His business is tailoring pants.  He's optimistic, enterprising, persevering, independent, responsible, and hardworking.

He works in the Gran Poder area, known for popular and informal business throughout the area and also for its celebrated folklore: The celebration of Señor Jesús del Gran Poder [Jesus of the Great Power] is traditional and folkloric in the city, and it's celebrated with an amazing popular celebration in honor of the image on linen that is venerated in the temple on Antonio Gallardo Street.  The climate is cold and dry, at an altitude of 3,600 meters above sea level and an approximate temperature between 8 and 21 degrees centigrade throughout the year.

Israel is dark and of average height, and he has short black hair.  His native language is Aymara, which is uses only with his older relatives; he speaks Spanish for business and in his daily life.  He lives in his parents' house, an apartment on three floors with potable water and electricity, where he installed a tailor shop in a small bedroom.

His business is making dress pants, shorts, bermuda shorts, athletic pants, overalls, boxer shorts, and so forth.  He makes sales wholesale, according to the number of orders he receives.  His dream is to have a much bigger shop, and with employees.

Israel wants to buy fabric wholesale to supply his end-of-year demand.  This is his first loan sequence with the institution in the six years he has been doing this work.

For these reasons Israel is requesting a loan to buy sewing materials to supply the demand for pants at this time of year.

loans.use: to buy sewing materials to satisfy the demand for pants this time of year

loans.name: Muamua

texts.en:
Muamua is 31 years old and single with one child. She has a small plantation where she grows taro and bananas that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for 2 years. u

Mamua needs a loan to buy new overalls, sprayers, chemicals, fertilizer, boots, 2 machetes and gloves. She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. Muamua will use the profits from her sales to pay for her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy new overalls, sprayers, chemicals, fertilizer, boots, 2 machetes and gloves.

loans.name: Solinuu

texts.en:
Solinuu is a 51-year-old woman who is married with 6 children. She has a small taxi business to earn an income. She has been in this business for 10 years.

Solinuu needs a loan to buy a new engine, a new paint job, new tyres, a new wind shield and also pay for her business license. She will use her profits to pay for her family's weekly expenses. Solinuu joined SPBD in 2004 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy a new engine, a new paint job, new tyres, a new wind shield and also to pay for her business license.

loans.name: Suesa

texts.en:
Suesa is 59 years old and married with 2 children. She has a small plantation where she grows taro and bananas that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for 7 years. 

Suesa needs a loan to buy fertilizer, chemicals, crops, a new wheelbarrow, sprayers and a large chain saw. She has been a member of SPBD since 2007. Suesa will use the profits from her sales to pay for her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, chemicals, crops, a new wheelbarrow, sprayers and a large chain saw.

loans.name: Atinae

texts.en:
Atinae is 49 years old and married with 4 children. She has a small plantation where she grows taro and bananas that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for 7 years. 

Atinae needs a loan to buy new boots, overalls, gloves, a machete, chemicals, a large chain saw and a second-hand pick-up for easy transportation. She has been a member of SPBD since 2007. Atinae will use the profits from her sales to pay for her families weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy new boots, overalls, gloves, a machete, chemicals, a large chain saw and a second-hand pick-up for easy transportation.

loans.name: Simativa

texts.en:
Simativa is 41 years old and married with 4 children. She owns and operates a small store, selling a variety of items. She has been doing this for 2 years. 

Simativa needs a loan to buy bags of salt, rice, sugar, a display fridge and frozen goods. She hopes to use her profits to pay for her family's weekly expenses. She became a member of SPBD in 2012 to gain access to capital for her business.

loans.use: to buy bags of salt, rice, sugar, a display fridge and frozen goods.

loans.name: Taliatalosaga

texts.en:
Taliatalosaga is a 29-year-old married woman with 6 children. She runs a small fishing business in her community to earn a living. She has 4 years of experience with this business. 

Taliatalosaga needs a loan to buy a new fishing canoe, a large cooler, a chest freezer, hooks and new goggles. She plans to use her profits to pay for her family's weekly expenses. Taliatalosaga has been a member of SPBD since 2010.

loans.use: to buy a new fishing canoe, a large cooler, a chest freezer, hooks and new goggles.

loans.name: Talaloa

texts.en:
Talaloa is a 63-year-old widow with 6 children. She makes and sells ice-cakes in her community to earn a living. She has 3 years of experience with this business. 

Talaloa needs a loan to buy cordials, a new chest freezer, a large spoon, Chinese candy, foam cups and a small cooler. She plans to use her profits to pay for her family's weekly expenses and hopefully help renovate her home. Talaloa has been a member of SPBD since 2011.

loans.use: to buy cordials, a new chest freezer, a large spoon, Chinese candy, foam cups and a small cooler.

loans.name: Matata

texts.en:
Matata is 42 years old and married with 8 children. She has a small plantation where she grows taro and bananas that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for 9 years. 

Matata needs a loan to buy a pick-up truck, 4 machetes, 3 tillers, a chain saw, a sprayer, chemicals and safety boots. She has been a member of SPBD since 2005. Matata will use the profits from her sales to pay for her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy a pick-up truck, 4 machetes, 3 tillers, a chain saw, a sprayer, chemicals and safety boots.

loans.name: Tofaga

texts.en:
Tofaga is 37 years old and married with 7 children. She has a small plantation where she grows taro and bananas that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for 5 years. 

Tofaga needs a loan to buy fertilizer, chemicals, new boots, a machete, a crowbar, a tiller and a wheelbarrow. She has been a member of SPBD since 2009. Tofaga will use the profits from her sales to pay for her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, chemicals, new boots, a machete, a crowbar, a tiller and a wheelbarrow.

loans.name: Malaeola

texts.en:
Malaeola is a 32-year-old married woman with 2 children. She runs a small fishing business in her community to earn a living. She has 2 years of experience with this business. 

Malaeola needs a loan to buy lots of hooks, baits, fishing rods, a small canoe, goggles, flippers and a life jacket. She plans to use her profits to pay for her family's weekly expenses. Malaeola has been a member of SPBD since 2012.

loans.use: to buy lots of hooks, baits, fishing rods, a small canoe, goggles, flippers and a life jacket.

loans.name: Lupesina

texts.en:
Lupesina is 32 years old and married with 2 children. She has a small plantation where she grows taro and bananas that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for 3 years. 

Lupesina needs a loan to buy chemicals, fertilizer, new gloves, a wheelbarrow, new boots, a crowbar and a tiller. She has been a member of SPBD since 2011. Lupesina will use the profits from her sales to pay for her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, fertilizer, new gloves, a wheelbarrow, new boots, a crowbar and a tiller.

loans.name: Badegna Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe BADEGNA est composé de femmes mariées, elles ont en moyenne 49 ans et 5 enfants. Elles vivent toutes dans des familles traditionnelles dans le village de Tingolé, préfecture de Dioïla, Région de Koulikoro (deuxième région administrative de la République du Mali).
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et d’amitié. Elles font le commerce de condiments et d’articles divers.
Les femmes du groupe BADEGNA sont à leur sixième prêt solidaire.
Dans le but de satisfaire la demande énorme de leurs clientèles, elles font recours à Soro Yiriwaso.
La cliente MARIAM, première personne de la gauche vers la droite dans le rang des assises est analphabète, elle est actuellement vendeuse de condiments. Elle compte acheter des sacs de sel, 1 panier de tomate, du grain d’arachide et des boites de patte de tomate chez les grossistes à Fana.
La vente se fait en détail et en espèce chez elle et au marché à une clientèle mixte. Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 35 000Fcfa, qui sera réinvesti dans son activité.
texts.en:
Badegna Group is made up of married women; on average, they are 49 years old and have five children. They all live in traditional families in the village of Tingolé, in Dioïla prefecture in the Koulikoro region (second administrative region in the Republic of Mali).

The group members know one another through family, neighborhood, and friendship ties. They sell vegetables/spices and various goods. The women of Badegna Group are on their sixth group loan.

With the goal of satisfying enormous customer demand, the group has turned to Soro Yiriwaso. Mariam, the first client from left to right in the row of women standing, is illiterate and is currently selling vegetables/spices. She plans to purchase sacks of salt, one basket of tomatoes, peanuts, and containers of tomatoes paste from the wholesalers in Fana.

Mariam makes her sales at retail prices for cash at her home to a group of customers made up of men and women. She expects to see a monthly profit of 35,000 CFA francs, which will be reinvested in her business.

loans.use: To purchase vegetables/spices.

loans.name: Otila

texts.en:
Otila is 32 years old and married with 2 children. She has a small plantation where she grows taro and bananas that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for 12 years. 

Otila needs a loan to buy fertilizer, chemicals, a new wheelbarrow, a chain saw, boots, gloves and a large crowbar. She has been a member of SPBD since 2002. Otila will use the profits from her sales to pay for her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, chemicals, a new wheelbarrow, a chain saw, boots, gloves and a large crowbar.

loans.name: Laulautumua

texts.en:
Laulautumua is 47 years old and married with 4 children. She has a small farm where she raises cows that she can sell in her community or to the public. She has been doing this for 13 years. 

Laulautumua needs a loan to buy timber, iron poles, nails, rolls of barbed wire, a water tank and a new chain saw. She has been a member of SPBD since 2001. Laulautumua will use the profits from her sales to pay for her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy timber, iron poles, nails, rolls of barbed wire, a water tank and a new chain saw.

loans.name: Matuli

texts.en:
Matuli is 58 years old and married with 6 children. She has a small plantation where she grows taro and bananas that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for 3 years. 

Matuli needs a loan to buy a new wheelbarrow, chemicals, fertilizer, new boots, gloves and a sprayer. She has been a member of SPBD since 2011. Matuli will use the profits from her sales to pay for her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy a new wheelbarrow, chemicals, fertilizer, new boots, gloves and a sprayer.

loans.name: Azarias

texts.pt:
Azarias tem  36 anos de idade, E casado tem 4 filhos dos quais 3 com idades escolares e 1 com menor idade, Azarias sustenta tambem dos sobrinhos que vive com ela. Com emprestimo pretende comprar pedra, cimento, ferros e arames para dar contuidade da construcao da sua casa.
O seu sonho e de aumentar  os cursos em varias areia, uma vez que e formado em serelharia e mecanica.
O seu principal desafio e de concluir a sua obra para melhor confortar a sua familia e contrair o matrimonio.
texts.en: Azarias is 36 years old. He is married with 4 children, 3 of whom attend school and the fourth is of pre-school age. Azarias is also responsible for caring for his 2 nephews who live with him. He will use this loan to buy stone, cement, iron and wire to continue building his house.He hopes to study more once he has completed his training as a locksmith and mechanic. His greatest challenge is finishing the building work on his home so that his family will be more comfortable and he will be able to fulfil the marriage vows that he made to his wife.

loans.use: to buy stone, cement, iron and wire to continue building his house.

loans.name: Feagaimalealii

texts.en:
Feagaimalealii is 40 years old and single with 2 children. She has a small plantation where she grows taro that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for 8 years. 

Feagaimalealii needs a loan to buy fertilizer, chemicals, new boots, a wheelbarrow, new gloves and a machete. She has been a member of SPBD since 2006. Feagaimalealii will use the profits from her sales to pay for her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, chemicals, new boots, a wheelbarrow, new gloves and a machete.

loans.name: Sharon

texts.en:
Sharon is 27 years old and unmarried with 3 children. She has a small plantation where she grows taro and bananas that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for 3 years. 

Sharon needs a loan to buy chemicals, shovels, crowbars, new boots, overall and a machete. She has been a member of SPBD since 2011. Sharon will use the profits from her sales to pay for her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, shovels, crowbars, new boots, overall and a machete.

loans.name: Lotovale

texts.en:
Lotovale is a 60-year-old widow with 5 children. She runs a small fishing business in her community to earn a living. She has 5 years of experience with this business. 

Lotovale needs a loan to buy a large chest freezer, bait, fishing rods and a large cooler. She plans to use her profits to pay for her family's weekly expenses. Lotovale has been a member of SPBD since 2009.

loans.use: to buy a large chest freezer, bait, fishing rods and a large cooler.

loans.name: Humberto

texts.es:
El socio Humberto se sigue dedicando al negocio de imprenta,el socio por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante,el sueño del socio es ampliar el negocio de imprenta.El socio solicita el credito para comprar tarjetas y folletos.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Humberto continues with his printing business, which helps him to move forward in his life. Humberto's dream is to grow his printing business. He is requesting this loan to purchase blank cards and brochure materials.

Humberto is happy for the loan and promises to comply with his established payments.

loans.use: to buy cards and brochure materials.

loans.name: Josefa Dolores

texts.es: Doña Josefa es una mujer emprendedora y laboriosa tiene la edad de 64 años, casada, y se dedica a la venta de nacatamales y sopas en su domicilio desde hace ocho años quien se ha dedicado por mantener y aumentar las ventas de su negocio. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de mecates, hojas de chagüites, quintales de maíz, verduras, pollo, carne, peroles,  etc. Con los créditos anteriores ha logrado aumentar la demanda y mejoramiento del hogar. Ella ha demostrado ser una persona responsable y honesta en los días de pago en la institución ADIM.
texts.en:
Josefa is an enterprising and hard working 64 year old married woman. She makes a living selling nacatamales (pork filled tamales) and soups from her home. For the last eight years, she has dedicated herself to maintaining and increasing her business sales. 

She is requesting this loan to buy twine, banana leaves, quintals of corn, vegetables, chicken, meat, pots, etc. With her previous loans, she has managed to increase the demand and has improved her home. She has shown that she is a responsible and honest person on her payment days at ADIM.

loans.use: to buy twine, banana leaves, quintals of corn, vegetables, chicken, meat, pots, etc. and manage to increase her sales.

loans.name: Sally

texts.en:
Sally is 21 years old and unmarried with one child. She owns and operates a small store, selling a variety of items. She has been doing this for two years.

Sally needs a loan to buy sacks of potatoes, onions, bags of rice, sugar, salt, flour, drinks, and canned food. She hopes to use her profits to pay for her family's weekly expenses.

She became a member of SPBD in 2012 to gain access to capital for her business.

loans.use: to buy sacks of potatoes, onions, bags of rice, sugar, salt, flour, drinks, and canned food.

loans.name: Talha

texts.en:
Talha is a 21-year-old single man from a village near Jenin City. he lives with his family in a small house in the village. Two years ago, Talha opened a store to sell phone accessories and do maintenance. He now has a good experience in this field.

Talha requested a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy more repair parts and phone accessories. This will increase his sales and also his income. 

Talha appears in the photo in his store.

loans.use: to buy more repair parts and phone accessories.

loans.name: Marhamat

texts.ru:
Мархамат жизнерадостная деятельная женщина в возрасте 58 лет. Она живет в городе Худжанд с мужем, сыном, невесткой и дочерью. Мархамат умеет вкусно готовить национальные блюда и в 2009 году она открыла свое кафе, где предлагает клиентам свои фирменные блюда. Клиенты всегда остаются довольными ее услугами. В кафе Мархамат, кроме нее работают еще несколько рабочих. У них всегда достаточно клиентов.  
Мархамат в данный момент обратилась за кредитом. Она собирается купить новую мебель для дома для создания комфортных условий. Мархамат надеется на вашу поддержку и обещает выплачивать кредит в срок за счет своей деятельности.
texts.en:
Marhamat is an optimistic and energetic 58-year old woman. She lives in the town of Khujand with her husband, son, daughter-in-law and daughter. Marhamat excels at cooking national dishes. In 2009 she opened her own café, where she servers her signature dishes. Her customers always remain satisfied. In addition to Marhamat herself, there are also several employees working in her café. They always have a  steady stream of customers.

At present Marhamat has applied for a loan. She intends to buy new furniture for her home to improve the family’s living comfort. Marhamat hopes for your support and promises to repay her loan on time thanks to income from her business.

loans.use: to buy furniture for improving her living conditions.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to provide maintenance to his cocoa crops.

loans.name: Dalal

texts.en:
Dalal is a 41-year-old married woman from a village near Jenin City. She is a mother of six sons. Her husband works as a construction worker where he gets a low and unstable income. Dalal and her husband also have agricultural land where they plant olive trees. All the family cooperates in the harvesting season.

Dalal took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy more olive seedlings for the family land. This will increase the farm productivity and also their income.

Dalal appears in the photo while she was harvesting olives.

loans.use: to buy more olive seedlings for the family land.

loans.name: Modesta

texts.en:
Modesta is 57 years old, with six children.

She earns a living by farming fruits in the Philippines. Modesta is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Modesta has been doing this for 12 years and also earns income from fruit juice vending.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Florentina

texts.pt:
Florentina de 40 anos de idade, vive maritalmente a 18 anos e tem 2 filhos com idade escolar. Ela é comerciante há mais de 16 anos, O seu horario de trabalho e das 06:30h as 17:00h. Sustenta tambem 2 sobrinho que vive com ela.
 O emprestimo sera aplicado na compra de panela, banhos maria, malinhas de talheres para revender.
   Os seus sonhos sao de crescer no negocio, com os rendimentos adiquirir uma viatura para facilitar na deslocacao e na aquisicao dos produto e construir um estabelecimento aredores da cidade de maputo.
texts.en: Florentina is 40 years old. She has been married for the last 18 years and has 2 children who both attend school. She has run her own business for more than 16 years, working daily from 6.30-17.00. She also has caring responsibilities for her 2 nephews who live with her. She plans to use this loan to buy saucepans,a bain marie and a case of cutlery to resell. In the future, she hopes to grow her business and use her income to buy a vehicle, which would make it easier for her to deliver and collect her products, as well as hoping to build a shop on the outskirts of Maputo city.

loans.use: to buy saucepans, bain marie and a case of cutlery to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase fertilizer for his cacao crop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more items for the grocery store to resell.

loans.name: Dúo Nuevo San Miguel Group

texts.es: Dúo “Nuevo San Miguel” quien está integrado por Irma Silvia quien es la líder, y tiene  32 años de edad se dedica a la venta de maíz por mayor y menor en su comunidad desde hace 3 años ella solicita su crédito para la compra de maíz por mayor y  frijol, leña y otra parte del crédito lo invertirá para confeccionar playeras ya que ella tiene la oportunidad de poder confeccionarlas y distribuirlas a personas que le solicitan este tipo de mercadería sus metas son poder formar un pequeño deposito donde poder vender granos básicos por mayor y menor ya que en su comunidad no hay lugares donde poder comprar granos a menor precio  en gran cantidad y venta de leña.
texts.en:
Irma Siliva is the leader of the duo group "Nuevo San Miguel". She is thirty-two years old and makes a living selling corn wholesale and in smaller quantities in her community. She has been doing this work for three years and is requesting a loan to buy corn wholesale.She also hopes to purchase beans and firewood. Another part of the loan will be used to invest in making t-shirts; Irma Silvia has the opportunity to make and distribute t-shirts to individuals who request this type of merchandise.

Her goals are to be able to have a small stall where she can sell basic food items wholesale and in smaller quantities. In her community, they do not have places where you can buy basic items wholesale for a lower cost; they also do not currently have someone who sells firewood.

loans.use: to bully food products to sell.

location.town: Aldea Vista Hermosa, San Pedro Sacatepequez

loans.name: Dúo Gotita De Cielo Group

texts.es:
Dúo Gotita de Cielo
Este dúo está formado por doña María Consuelo, ella tiene 33 años de edad y se dedica a la crianza de pollos, conejos y a las manualidades para fiesta de cumpleaños,  desde ya hace varios años, en el municipio de San Bartolomé Milpas Altas, ella está solicitando el crédito para la compra de 50 pares de pollos de engorde y compra de dos quintales de concentrado y un quintal de maíz amarillo, su deseo es destazar los pollos que actualmente tiene y  poder hacer crecer más su corral, además de ello su anhelo es mejorar su casa, y para que sus hijos vivan mas cómodos.
texts.en:
The Dúo Gotita de Cielo group has two members. One of them is María Consuelo. She is thirty-three years old and makes a living raising chickens and rabbits, and also in making crafts for birthday celebrations. She has been doing this work for several years in the San Bartolomé Milpas Altas municipality.

She is requesting a loan to purchase 50 pairs of chickens to fatten. She will also buy two quintals of chicken feed and another quintal of yellow cornmeal. Her wish is to butcher the chickens that she currently has so that she can also expand the chicken pen area. 

She hopes to ultimately improve her house so that her children may live more comfortably.

loans.use: to buy and raise animals.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to grow her inventory and consequently earn a higher income to support her family.

loans.name: Aldo Javier

texts.es:
Aldo Javier tiene 33 años de edad, su estado civil es conviviente, reside en el distrito de Morropon, él natural de la zona, vive en casa propia, junto a su familia. La vida en la comunidad es tranquila y se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería, ademas del comercio. Su comunidad está ubicada en el distrito y provincia de Morropón, región de Piura, costa norte de Perú.

La actividad a la que se dedica Aldo Javier es a brindar el servicio de transporte de pasajeros, en su mototaxi, además también se dedica a la venta de cerveza. Aldo Javier cuenta con más de 5 años de experiencia en el negocio, él cuenta con muy buenas referencias perosnales y laborales en la zona donde vive. El destino del crédito será para mejorar su mototaxi cambio completo de carpas y parabrisas, pues desea darle una mejor vista a su herramienta de trabajo para poder captar un número mayor de clientes, lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Aldo Javier is 33 years old and has a life partner. He lives in the Morropon district, of which he is a native, in his own home together with his family.  Life in the community is calm and its people work in agriculture and livestock as well as in business. His community is located in the district and province of Morropon, in the Piura region on the north coast of Peru.

Aldo Javier makes his living providing transportation services to passengers in his mototaxi. He also sells beer. Aldo Javier has over five years of experience in his business and has very good personal and business references in the area in which he lives. 

The purpose of the credit will be to improve his mototaxi by completely changing the tarp and windscreen. He would like to improve the appearance of his business tool in order to be able to attract more customers, which will, in the short term, improve his income, increase his earnings and thus improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to improve his mototaxi (completely change the tarp and windscreen).

loans.name: Harriet

texts.en:
Harriet is a married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 54 years old now.

Harriet has a room rental business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 25,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy materials to use in her business.

Harriet has been in this business for 23 years. In the future, she would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy materials to use in her business

loans.name: Hortencia

texts.pt:
Hortencia de 51 anos de idade solteira   tem 1 filho encontra-se a residir na vizinha Africa do Sul.  Hortencia e comerciante a mais de 4 anos possui um estabelecimento no quintal da sua residencia, sustenta tambem 7 netos que vivem com ela.
Com o valor de emprestimo vai comprar blusas, calcas, e manta para dar continuidade com o seu negocio
O seu sonho e de crescer no seu negocio e com os rendimentos custear as despesas escolares dos seus netos ate concluirem o ensino superior. 
O seu principal desafio e de construir um aviario no quintal da sua casa para varia de negocio uma vez que essa actividade da bons rendimentos
texts.en: Hortencia is 51 years old and single. She has one son who lives in neighbouring South Africa. Hortencia has been running her own business - a shop in her backyard - for the last 4 years. She has caring responsibilities for her 7 grandchildren who live with her. She plans to use this loan to buy blouses, trousers and blankets so that her business can continue. Her dream is to grow her business and use her income to pay for her grandchildren to continue with their schooling until they have completed their higher education. Her greatest challenge is building an aviary in her backyard so that she can diversify her business once her other business is showing good returns.

loans.use: to buy blouses, trousers and blankets so that her business can continue.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase some home appliances for his house such as a new refrigerator, washing machine, stove and other appliances.

loans.name: Rosa Miriam

texts.es:
Rosa Miriam vive en casa propia con cónyuge. Ella cuenta con buenas referencias personales, laborales y económicas. De familia unida. Vive en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganaderia. Ubicada en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Rosa Miriam se dedica a la cria y venta de chanchos, en el distrito de Cayaltí desde hace 05 años aproximadamente. El destino del préstamo es para la compra de una cantidad mayor de animales, así como alimentos de engorde balanceado y para arreglo de corral donde son criados, para poder criarlos en mejores condiciones y mejor calidad, lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa Miriam lives with her spouse in her own house. She has good personal, work and financial references. She is a member of a close knit family that lives in a community where most people work in trade, agriculture and livestock farming. This community is located in the Cayaltí district in the Chiclayo province which is in the Lambayeque region on the north coast of Peru. 

Rosa Miriam has been making a living by raising and selling pigs in the Cayaltí district for approximately five years. The loan will be used to purchase more animals, more feed and to repair the pen that the animals are raised in. This is so that they can be raised in better conditions, which would also allow Rosa Miriam to improve her income and increase her profits in a short period of time and, thereby, improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more animals, more feed and to repair the pen that the animals are raised in.

loans.name: James

texts.es:
James vive en casa propia de material rustico, vive con su conyugue y sus cuatro menores hijos de 11, 9, 7, 2 años de edad, de los cuales los tres primeros cursan primaria en colegio nacional del caserio Cabrachica, James tiene 32 años de edad, y cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales en su comunidad, la misma que está ubicada en el distrito de Pucará, provincia de Jaén, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú. Y se dedica básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

La actividad a la que se dedica James es la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de piña ubicado en el caserio Cabrachica, con una experiencia en el rubro de 10 años, el préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en labores agrícolas, aplicaciones e incorporaciones de productos fito sanitarios, fertilizantes, y mano de obra para su cosecha. De esta manera lo ayudará a la mejora tanto fisiológica, morfológica y productiva de su cultivo, así como también tener una cosecha oportuna, y por ende tendrá mayor producción, una mejor calidad de producto, por lo cual no tendrá problemas en vender su producto.
texts.en:
James lives in his own house made from rustic materials together with his spouse and his four children of ages 11, 9, 7, and 2. The first three of these go to primary school in the national school of the hamlet of Cabrachica. James is 32 years old and has very good references in his community, both personal and professional in nature. His community is located in the district of Pucará, in the province of Jaén, the Cajamarca region, in the northern sierra of Peru. 
The main occupations of villagers are agriculture, livestock rearing and trade. 

James works in agriculture, particularly in the cultivation of pineapples in the hamlet of Cabrachica, and has 10 years of experience in this field. He will use the loan that will be granted to him to pay for agricultural tasks, the application and incorporation of phytosanitary products and fertilizers, and to employ farmhands for his harvest. In this way the loan will help him to improve his crops physiologically, morphologically and in terms of their productivity, and also ensure a plentiful harvest. In the end, he will have a greater production, a better quality of his products, and no problems in selling his products.

loans.use: to pay for agricultural tasks and the application and incorporation of phytosanitary products and fertilizers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new rickshaw to replace his old one.

loans.name: Amanda Azucena

texts.es: La Señora Amanda Azucena de 27 años tiene 2 hijos (6, 1 mes)  quien se dedica a la venta de comida en la sede  de la Universidad de la Antigua Guatemala hace mas de 1 año y la venta de productos de cosméticos desde  hace mas de 5 años solicita un crédito para invertir en la compra de insumos (gaseosas, agua pura, carbón, embutidos, panes, jugos) y otra parte lo utilizara para la compra de cosméticos (lociones, cremas, desodorantes, shampoo, etc) ya que se acerca la temporada navideña y graduaciones y ella desea aprovechar para invertir y lograr obtener mejores ganancias en su negocio ya que su sueño es poder comprar un terreno ya que donde ella vive es muy pequeño y no tiene suficiente espacio para darles a sus hijos un mejor hogar donde poder vivir.
texts.en:
Amanda Azucena is 27 years old and has two children (a 6 year old and 1 month old). For over a year, she has made a living selling food on the campus of the University of La Antigua Guatemala, and for over five years, she has sold cosmetics. She is requesting this loan to invest in the purchase of supplies (carbonated drinks, pure water, coal, sausages, breads, juices) and another part to buy cosmetics (lotions, creams, deodorants, shampoo, etc) now that the Christmas and graduation seasons are approaching. 

She would like to take advantage of investing and manage to generate more profit from her business, since her dream is to be able to buy land given that it's very small where she lives, and she does not have enough space to give her children a better home to live in.

loans.use: to buy food products and cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: He Muong 3 Group

texts.en:
Mr. Mai is 35 years old, is married, and has five children aged 18, 15, 14, 13 and 10. He lives with his wife and his children, along with his parents, in a small downgraded house. They are all Hmong people and rely on agricultural production with traditional farming methods for a living. Indeed, Mai's family grows rice and cassava on a terraced field. Besides, they breed chickens, fish and buffaloes to have extra income.

Because of his crowded family, Mr. Mai wants to expand production to better provide for them. For that reason, he has taken out a loan from the Anh Chi Em Program to have capital as well as to get training and counselling about cultivation and animal husbandry from the Program. This is the first time he has had a loan from the Program, and he will use it to buy piglets and food for the pigs.

Mr. Mai hopes that the piglets will grow fast and bring high income for his family. He dreams his family will have a more abundant life and live happily and healthily.

loans.use: to buy piglets and food for the pigs

loans.name: Alaa

texts.en:
Alaa is a 29-year-old married man from Deir Al-Balah. He lives with his wife in a small house. One year ago,  Alaa bought a rickshaw and started working with it. He distributes goods to the local traders.

Alaa took a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to pay the remaining balance for his rickshaw. By taking this loan, Alaa will be able to pay the urgent obligations he has.

Alaa appears in the photo with his new rickshaw.

loans.use: to pay the remaining balance for his rickshaw

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es:
Juan Jose tiene 39 años de edad, su estado civil es soltero, reside en el distrito de Morropón, él es natural de la zona, vive en casa propia, junto a su familia. La vida en la comunidad es tranquila y se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería, además del comercio. Su comunidad está ubicada en el distrito y provincia de Morropón, región de Piura, costa norte de Perú.

La actividad a la que se dedica Juan Jose es a la elaboración y venta de pan, actividad que la realiza desde hace más de 5 años, él cuenta con 4 personas como clientes fijos los cuales le compran a diario y reparten en los caserío de Morropon. Juan Jose cuenta con experiencia en el negocio, muy conocido con buenas referencias laborales y personales en la zona. El destino del crédito será para la compra de harina al por mayor ya que cuenta con pedido para dulces por las fiestas del día de los muertos. Al incrementar su producción Juan Jose podrá atender oda la demanda que tiene, lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Juan Jose is 39 years old and is single. He lives in the district of Morropón and is from that area. He lives in his own house along with his family. Life in the community is tranquil and he works as a farmer and cattleman and is also a businessman. His community is located in the district and province of Morropón, on the north coast of Perú.
Jose works making and selling bread and has been doing this for more than 5 years. He has 4 steady customers who buy from him daily and distribute the bread in the villages of the area. Juan Jose has experience in this business, is very well known, and has good work and personal references. He will use this loan to buy flour in bulk to fulfill orders for cakes for the Day Of The Dead. By increasing his production, Juan Jose will be able to meet his customers' demands. This will enable him to improve his income in a short time and, therefore, to improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy flour in bulk to fulfill orders for cakes for the Day Of The Dead

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.en:
Emmanuel who is a 28-year-old, hard-working man, living in Kamwenge, Uganda used his previous loan to buy more maize and coffee to sell. He still deals in produce, selling maize and coffee as his main source of income, although he also practices agriculture and motor cycle transport, where he earns extra income. 

He started this business to earn a living and have a better standard of living. He still faces the challenges of poor roads and the unpredictable weather changes that affect his produce business. However, he has a vision of owning a big modern produce store and becoming rich in the future.

Emmanuel is requesting a loan to buy more maize and coffee to sell.

loans.use: to buy more maize and coffee to sell.

loans.name: Tareq

texts.en:
Tareq is 24 years old. He is working at a shop repairing phones; he lives in Gaza with his wife and two daughters.

He is one of the affected people from the last war in Gaza. His house was fully destroyed, and he would like to repair it. For these reasons, he has requested a loan from Ryada to build the kitchen again, install pipelines, and to buy glass and planks for renovating his home. 

Tareq is very grateful to everyone who helps him. He hopes to be able to be back to his normal life again with his family, and to provide good living conditions for his children.

loans.use: to rebuild the kitchen, install pipelines, and to buy glass and planks for renovating his home.

loans.name: Mahmmod

texts.en:
Mahmmod is 27 years old. He lives with his parents in Gaza, and is working as a sociologist at a Social institution. 

His house was fully destroyed at the last war at Gaza; Mahmmod is asking Ryada for this loan to buy flagstones to pave his house and rebuild it. This will help him to live in it with his family. He has a shortage of money to buy the things he needs and help his parents. He is very grateful to everyone who helps him.

loans.use: to buy flagstones to pave his house and rebuild it

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more wholesale products at lower prices to sell to traders in the market

loans.name: Nour

texts.en:
Nour is a 20-year-old student. She is a single woman who lives in Irbid.

 Nour is in her second year in the university studying media and public relations. Her father has retired and she has a working brother who helps the household financially. Nour’s purpose in applying for he loan is to pay her university fees.

loans.use: to pay for her university fees.

loans.name: Maricela Del Socorro

texts.es: Maricela del Socorro: Es originaria de Rosita, tiene 51 años de edad, casada, tiene 2 hijos, el mayor de 33 años es independiente y la menor de 22 años, estudia su cuarto año de la carrera de administración de empresas. Cuenta con una experiencia de más de 3 décadas de ser docentes. Su esposo se encuentra desempleado. Con el propósito de tener una fuente de ingresos adicional, desde hace 2 años estableció una pequeña pulpería, solicita financiamiento para construir anexo, será utilizado como local para su negocio. Gracias a los créditos otorgados anteriormente por PANA PANA, le permitieron construir su pozo y cerco de madera. Su sueño es construir su vivienda de concreto.
texts.en: Maricela del Socorro is originally from Rosita. She is 51 years old, married, and has 2 children - the oldest is 33 years old and is independent and the youngest is 22 years old and is in the 4th year of a business degree. She has more than 3 decades of experience as a teacher. Her husband is unemployed. With the goal of having an additional source of income, she opened a small grocery store 2 years ago. She is requesting a loan to build an annex that will be used as a store for her business. Thanks to the loan she previously received from PANA PANA, she was able to build a well and a wooden fence. Her dream is to build a concrete house.

loans.use: to build an annex that will be used as a store for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more goats to improve his business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase new fishing gear for her husband and renew their delivery car license.

loans.name: Samirah

texts.en:
Samirah is a 51-year-old widow. She lives in Alzarqa.  Samirah buys ready-made clothes and sells them to the people in the neighborhood. 

Samirah’s purpose in applying for the loan is to buy more ready-made clothes and to sell them. Samirah’s future plan is to develop her project and open a shop selling ready-made clothes.

loans.use: to buy more ready-made clothes to increase her profits

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco vive en casa propia de material rustico de dos niveles, vive con su cónyugue cuenta con un hijo de 18 años, Francisco tiene 57 años radicando en la zona, tiene muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales en su comunidad, la misma que está ubicada en el distrito de Cañarís, provincia de Ferreñafe, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

La actividad a la que se dedica Francisco es la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de café ubicado en el caserio Illambe - Cañaris, con una experiencia en el rubro de 13 años, el préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en labores agricolas, aplicaciones e incorporaciones de productos fito sanitarios, fertilizantes, y mano de obra para su cosecha. De esta manera lo ayudará a la mejora tanto fisiológica, morfológica y productiva de su cultivo, así como también tener una cosecha oportuna, y por ende tendrá mayor producción, una mejor calidad de producto, por lo cual no tendrá problemas en vender su producto.
texts.en:
Francisco lives in his own house which is made of rustic materials and has 2 stories. He lives with his spouse and they have an 18 year old son. Francisco has lived in the area for 57 years. He has very good personal as well as work references in his community, which is located in the district of Cañarís in the province of Ferreñafe and the region of Lambayeque on the north coast of Peru. The people in his community work in agriculture, raising livestock, and in business. 
Francisco is a farmer. Specifically, he grows coffee in the village of Illambe-Cañaris. He has 13 years of experience in this work. He will use the loan for his agricultural work, in the application of plant protection products and fertilizers, and for labor at harvest time. In this way, he will improve the physiology and shape of his crop as well as its productivity. This will enable him to have a timely harvest, improved production, and a better quality product, which means that he'll have no trouble selling his crop.

loans.use: with agricultural work, the application of plant protection products and fertilizers, and for labor at harvest time.

loans.name: Feras

texts.en:
Firas is a 20-year-old single man from Khanyounis. He lives with his parents in a simple house. His father works as an employee in a local firm where he earns a low income. This is the only source of income for the family. 

Firas is a student at a local university where he is studying information technology. He would like to complete his studies and find a job to help his family with their expenses.

Firas is taking out a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a new laptop for his studies so he can use special programs to easily do his homework and reports.
 
Firas appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his studies.

loans.name: Etidal

texts.en: Etidal lives in Marka. She is a flower arranging artist. Her project started 2 years ago. Etidal’s purpose in applying for the loan is that she needs to increase her capital and promote her business, and buy more raw materials for making flowers.

loans.use: to buy more raw materials for making flowers

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is 27 years old and lives with his wife in Gaza. He has been working at Gaza's electricity company for seven years. Mohammad  is one of the  people affected by the last war in Gaza. His house was partially destroyed and he would like to repair it. 

For this reason, he has requested a loan from Ryada to install doors, and rebuild and paint the walls of his home damaged by the shooting. 

Mohammad is very grateful to everyone who helps him. He hopes to be able to get back to his normal life again with his family, and to provide good living conditions for his children.

loans.use: to install doors, and rebuild and paint the walls of his home damaged by the shooting

loans.name: Soleyma Geraldina

texts.es: Soleyma de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hija y su esposo quien trabaja y le ayuda económicamente, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa su negocio lo tiene ubicado en el mercado municipal y tiene muchos clientes fijos por la calidad de la ropa y los buenos precios, Soleyma está solicitando un crédito para la comprar de mas ropa por mayor para poder continuar con sus ventas y así poder tener mejore ingresos.
texts.en:
Soleyma, 37, lives in her own house with her daughter and her husband who works and helps her economically. 

She has a clothes-selling business which is located in the municipal market. She has many steady customers thanks to the quality of the clothing she sells and the good prices she offers. 

Soleyma is asking for a loan to buy more clothing from a wholesaler so she can continue with her sales and generate more income.

loans.use: to buy more clothing from a wholesaler

loans.name: Benito

texts.es:
El socio se sigue dedicando al negocio de maestro de construccion,el socio realiza casas y edificios, el sueño del socio es ampliar el negocio de maestro de construccion.El socio solicita el crédito para comprar materiales de construcción como madera y herramientas.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: This member is still working in construction making houses and buildings. His dream is to expand his construction business. He is asking for the loan to buy construction materials such as wood and tools. He is grateful for the loan and promises to make his repayments.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as wood and tools.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 21 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo,posee desde hace 3 años una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, la joven vive en casa propia con su madre, ella está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
The young woman pictured whose face has been blurred out because she is only 21 years old and lives in a high-risk area, has owned a small store for three years. It is located in her house and she has many customers because of her good prices and how friendly she is when she sells. She lives in her own home with her mother.

She is asking for a loan to be able to buy more soup, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, candy, sweet bread, etc. With this, she'll be able to increase her income and have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more soup, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, candy, sweet bread, etc.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is 28 years old and lives with his parents in Gaza. He has a workshop for repairing electronics goods and has been involved in this retail business for many years. 

Mohammad's house was partly destroyed in the last war in Gaza and he would like to repair it. Therefore, he has requested a loan from Ryada to to buy building materials to renovate his home so he can build the ceiling and the walls as a start. He would then like to rebuild the damage in the kitchen, and install doors and windows.
 
Mohammad is very grateful to everyone who helps him.

loans.use: to buy building materials to renovate his home so he can build the ceiling and the walls as a start.

loans.name: Susana

texts.en:
Susana is a married woman with three children. Susana is 56 years old and one of her children is in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Susana has a food vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to purchase ingredients for her food vending business. She has been in this business for 15 years. 

In the future, Susana would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her food vending business.

loans.name: Estrellas Del Sur - 27 Group

texts.es:
Jacinta es una mujer de 38 años de edad, casada, tiene tres hijas de 20, 10 y 5 años de edad, y su negocio es la venta de verduras.
Ella es buena madre, independiente, constante, responsable y trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza en la zona ‘cruce villa Adela’ un sitio caracterizado por conectar a varias zonas de la ciudad mediante transporte público, desde este lugar se puede conseguir transporte a zonas alejadas de la ciudad de el Alto, de clima frío y seco con una temperatura constante entre 4-12 grados centígrados durante todo el año y a una altura de 3800 metros sobre el nivel del mar.
Jacinta es de tez morena, estatura mediana, cabello negro largo, su lengua materna es el aymará que utiliza con su familia para el trabajo en el comercio se usa el español (de pie al centro, usa chompa negra). Su vida la realiza con su esposo que se dedica a la construcción y sus hijas; la mayor estudia secretariado, la del medio estudia en la escuela y la menor se encuentra empezando el kínder. Viven en casa de su suegra que es de ladrillo y cuenta con agua potable, electricidad y gas. La necesidad por mejorar su negocio la llevó a conformar una banca de personas con negocios como; taller de costura, elaboración de empanadas, venta de productos cosméticos, venta de chamarras, venta de mandiles, venta de chompas de alpaca y venta de polleras, para solicitar un préstamo y mejorar sus actividades. Su negocio es la venta de verduras como; coliflor, zanahorias, lechugas, zapallos, etc., actividad que realiza diariamente en el mercado de la zona. La ventaja de su negocio es que sus productos se acaban a diario y obtiene una renta diaria la desventaja es que tiene mucha competencia. Su sueño es construir su casa en un terreno que se compró y que aún sigue pagando. Ella desea realizar la compra de verduras por mayor para distribuirla a revendedores y vender por mayor y menor. Esta es la primera secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 5 años que viene realizando esta labor.
Es por esos motivos que Jacinta solicita un préstamo para la compra de verduras por mayor para vender por mayor y menor.
texts.en:
Jacinta is a 38 year-old woman that is married and has three daughters of ages 20, 10 and 5. She has a vegetable selling business. 
She is a good mother, independent, reliable, responsible and hardworking. She carries out her occupation in the area 'cruce villa Adela', a location characterized by its connection to several areas of the city through public transport. From this location it is possible to reach the el Alto region, far from the city, of a cold and dry climate with a constant year-round temperature between 4 and 12 degrees and an altitude of 3800 meters over sea level. 
Jacinta is of darker complexion, medium height, has long black hair, and her mother tongue is aymara, which she uses with her family when she is working. In her business she speaks Spanish (she walks into the center of town, wearing a black sweater). She leads her life with her spouse, who works in construction, and her daughters; the older one studies to become a secretary, the middle one goes to school and the smallest one is starting kindergarten. They live in the house of her mother-in-law, which is made from bricks and has drinking water, electricity and gas. The need to improve her business led her to join a bank of people with businesses such as dressmaking shops, the production of empanadas, the sale of cosmetics, the sale of jackets, the sale of aprons, the sale of alpaca sweaters, and the sale of skirts, in order to request a loan and improve her business activities. She sells vegetables such as cauliflower, carrots, salad, squash etc. on a daily basis in the market of the area. The advantage of her business is that her products sell out daily and she receives a daily income; the disadvantage is that she has much competition. She dreams of building her house on a plot of land that she bought and that she is still paying off. She wishes to buy her vegetables in bulk to distribute them to resellers and to sell them in wholesale and retail settings. This is the first series of loans with the institution in the 5 years she has been doing this work. This is why Jacinta requests a loan for the purchase of vegetables in bulk to sell in wholesale and retail settings.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables in bulk in order to sell them in wholesale and retail settings.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy peanut snacks, other snacks, and clothing to sell.

loans.name: Araceli Quimberli

texts.es:
Araceli es una joven muy emprendedora y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, tiene 18 años y vive en Lima junto a su familia. Ya que no pudo seguir con sus estudios superiores por la falta de economía en su casa tuvo que buscar la manera de apoyar a su familia por ello está trabajando como costurera y también vendiendo productos de belleza. Ella cree que le está yendo bien porque es muy trabajadora, responsable, siempre está dispuesta a seguir aprendiendo porque quiere más adelante tener su propio negocio de costura.
Araceli está muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado podrá comprar una máquina remalladora para empezar con su negocio y así pueda independizarse. ella más adelante espera estudiar una carrera de diseño y costura para poder perfeccionarse y seguir brindado productos de calidad.
texts.en:
Araceli is a young woman who is very hardworking and would really like to get ahead. She is 18 years old and lives in Lima with her family. Since she couldn't continue on with higher education due to lack of financial resources, she had to look for a way to support her family. This is why she's working as a seamstress and also selling beauty products. She thinks it's going well because she's a hard worker, responsible and is always open to keep learning because she wants to have her own seamstress business in the future. 

Araceli is very grateful to Kiva lenders because with the support they've given her she will be able to buy a sewing machine to start her business and become independent. She hopes to go back to school to study design and sewing, which will help her improve and continue creating quality products.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine for her sewing workshop

loans.name: Dúo Villa Argentina Group

texts.es: Dúo Villa Argentina, este grupo esta conformado por la señora Zulma Lorena de 36 años de edad ella se dedica al aventa de cosmetico desde hace varios años, es una persona muy dedica a su actividad economica ya que su negocio le ha servido para sacar adelantes a su familia en esta oportunidad ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de cosmeticos para la venta, esperando que le puedan ayudar con el credito solicitado
texts.en:
Zulma Lorena, 36, is a member of the 'Dúo Villa Argentina' group. For a number of years has sold cosmetics. She is very dedicated to her work because her business has allowed her to support her family. 

She is asking for this loan to buy cosmetics to sell, hoping that lenders will help her with the amount requested.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics to sell

loans.name: Silvia Carolina
